description.text: Wellness tourism includes activities whose main motivation is to contribute to tourists’ physical, mental, and spiritual health through medical and wellness activities

Massages, temazcal baths, acupuncture, meditation, yoga, and spiritual retreats are just some of the activities included in wellness tourism. Mexico is number one in wellness tourism in Latin America and ranks 7th among the top 20 countries worldwide for number of wellness tourists.
Just like health, tourism is a right, and in Mexico we make sure you fully enjoy both. Here you’ll find all kinds of destinations and activities for relaxing and taking care of yourself.
